comments.comment: Sinhala jathiye ipaduna Dhanaya balaya thiyena oya loku deshapalakayo ekek me wage ape jathiye minissu widina duka dakinne naha. Un apita surangana loka hadanna unta chande denna kiyala ape chande apiwa rawattala aragena thattu gewal gahagena Prado walin yanawa apema salli walin padi ganna Police Army escort ekakuth dagena. Monawa karannada apith me rate e wage wasala nayakayo yatathe inna ipadune apima kalin jeewitha wala karapu paw walata. Ithin yaluwane api dhanawath aya nowunath apita puluwan widiyata rupiyal 100 gane hari me ayata ekathu wela demu. Ethakota punchi ape sahayogayen me daruwanta geyak unath hadaganna tharam mudalak ekathu wewi. Ithin manussakam danna apema soduru minisun ekathu wewa! Mamath mata haki uparimayen udaw karanawa.!
